Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Prohibits ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment, and requires original sellers of tickets to be licensed by the secretary of state
Summary: Prohibits ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment; requires original sellers of tickets to be licensed by the secretary of state; exempts ticket sales by governmental or not-for-profit organizations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to prohibiting ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment, and requiring original sellers of tickets to be licensed by the secretary of state
